name: Detail - Design check locations of Poles and check for any clashes with underground services or similar

Detail - The final walkover must be scheduled at least one week before the site's completion or demobilisation.

Records - Snag List signed by attendees

○ A survey as-built of completed work must be provided

○ All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with the Handover QA file.
